title: Ocean Week
body: Shouldn't have had to enlist cause some people will keep playing thinking they are helping but they aren't signed up

replies.body: Ocean Week is meant to be an active progress with a common goal in mind. If there were no enlist option, it'd just be based on overall server wins which isn't so much a testament to that common goal rather than just server activity, if that makes sense.

To add to what Wuks said, if people actually read the things, they would know it's a opt-in thing (hell anyone that has been around for more than a year would know it's opt-in and even most event's are opt-in)
But last year it was in the client and you didn't have to go to a webpage.

The Ocean Week hub is available this year as well, but it is only available within the LCU client. If you're using the Legacy client, you have the backup plan of seeing your progress through the site.
I signed up for this. No idea what it's really about, but cashed in the 4 game ip boost.
